title: BMW Tunnel
subtitle: Installation
description: An audiovisual installation that recreated the visceral experience of walking down a tunnel alive with the sounds of anticipation, and then running into a packed stadium that explodes with a panorama of passionate supporters. Combined MAX/MSP for audio, Arduino for real camera flashes and openFrameworks for live animation.

title: Pandora
subtitle: Installation
description: We created bespoke interactive animation scenes for the launch of the Pandora jewellery ranges. Kinect sensor for motion tracking and Processing for generative graphics.

title: SAB Kickstart Wall
subtitle: Installation
description: A giant spanned projection wall with animation and video triggered by hidden floor sensors.

title: Virtual Dealership
subtitle: Permanent Installation
description: A bespoke Virtual Dealership experience created for Bidvest Automotive - featuring Augmented Reality, multi-screen sychronisation, 3D graphics and gesture-controlled interfaces to take dealerships into the future.
